spec_data.Name: glue-validator
spec_data.Description:
A validation framework for Grid information providers.
This framework validates the information return against the GLUE information
model from the Open Grid Forum.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:25:15 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A validation framework for Grid information providers
